text: Greg Montesi (born April 15, 1959) is an American rower. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Greg Montesi
